(HellBeast put a Pred chip in the pod while she was in stasis lock.  
So she went from Maximal to Predacon.  Archangle knew this, and was 
going to have her fixed up, but didn't get the time,  just so you 
know)

Trinity::

She looked up and smiled, still in saber tooth tiger kitten 
mode. "Yeah, I'll go with you. What do you want me to do?  I'll tear 
into those maximals and rip them to shreds."  She growled and roared 
in proper kitten fashion and tried to look big and impressive.  (is 
about the size of a 20 lb cat)



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Anyhting wrong with the Archangel part of this post, tell me.
> 
> :::Archangel/Ratchet:::
> 
> ::He sees that she is uspet again::
> Archangel: Dont worry.  Well find your parents.
> ::he hears about he battle at the Ark and transforms to beast mode::
> Archangel: You coming with us, kid?  Well defend you if theres 
trouble.  Or 
> do you want me to get you a room first?
> --------------------------------------------------------------------
----------
> 
> ---------------------------------------------
> Ratchet: Good!  I'm down with kicking some Trainer butt!  I sat out 
the last 
> battle, but this time im ready!
